serviceArea: Central Oregon ~100 mile radius - Bend, Redmond, Prineville, Sisters, La Pine, Sunriver, Tumalo, Terrebonne, Madras
shortDescription: Professional asphalt seal coating & hot rubber crack repair. 35+ years Central Oregon experience. Family-owned. 100% 5-Star reviews. Military Veteran Discount.
longDescription: Raised in Central Oregon, Mountain Asphalt LLC knows this land like the back of their hand. Over the past three decades, they've built a strong reputation by combining local knowledge with proven asphalt techniques. Family-owned and operated, they don't just pave surfaces â€” they build lasting relationships with customers. Every project is completed as if it were for their own family, with a focus on clear communication, honesty, and attention to every detail. Services include Asphalt Sealcoating (protects pavement from UV rays, water, oil, and chemicals, extends lifespan 5-10 years) and Hot Rubber Asphalt Crack Repair (stops water intrusion, prevents potholes). They never dilute their seal coating like some contractors, ensuring longer-lasting results. Residential and commercial services available.
notes: EVIDENCE LINKING: HubSpot contact ID 116464176022 confirmed via: (1) Phone (541) 280-0689 in HubSpot matches website, Yelp listing, and Facebook page, (2) Email mountainasphalt1@gmail.com in HubSpot matches website contact form, (3) Address '380 SW 5th St #432, Madras, OR 97741' in HubSpot matches Yelp business location. 100% 5-star reviews on Google verified via web search. Family-owned business serving Central Oregon for 35+ years.
